channel.title: Projects on Bo Haggard
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Bo Haggard

item.title: Gig Wordpress
item.description: Gig Website Project to develop site that showcases robust CI/CD functionality for demo purposes. Solution will be cost effective while still demonstrating Enterprise grade capability. Solution will be containerized via Docker and deployed leveraging Azure DevOps and Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Professional's Website
item.description: Professional’s Website Project to develop simple and cost effective solution for generating a website for presentation of professional profile.

item.title: Company Wordpress
item.description: Project to design and develop wordpress infra that is durable, resilient, scalable and able to conform to various compliance intiatives.

item.title: Personal Wordpress
item.description: Project to design and develop simple wordpress site for personal blogging
